item.title: 股市汹涌，"五月卖出 "的古老智慧重获关注
item.description: 一条古老的市场格言笼罩着美国股市的反弹：五月卖出，然后离开。【原文：An age-old market maxim looms over the bounce in US stocks: Sell in May and go away.】

item.title: 法院就性别问题做出裁决后，英国统计局考虑修改调查内容
item.description: 最高法院的一项具有里程碑意义的裁决称，平等法对女性的定义是指她们出生时的性别，此后，英国统计机构正在考虑是否需要改变其收集数据的方式。【原文：The UK’s statistics agency is considering whether it needs to change the way it collects data after a landmark Supreme Court ruling said the definition of a woman under equalities law refers to their sex assigned at birth.】

item.title: 国债在再融资计划和重要经济数据公布前保持稳定
item.description: 由于交易员们在等待通胀和经济增长数据，以及债务管理团队对 29 万亿美元市场的销售计划，美国国债保持了近期的涨势。【原文：US Treasuries held recent gains as traders awaited data on inflation and economic growth, as well as the debt management team’s plans for sales in the $29 trillion market.】

item.title: 初创电动飞机制造商 Heart 从瑞典迁往美国
item.description: 瑞典电动飞机制造商 Heart Aerospace AB 将把总部从哥德堡迁至洛杉矶，并称此举将促进产品开发。【原文：Swedish electric plane manufacturer Heart Aerospace AB is relocating its headquarters to Los Angeles from Gothenburg in a move it says will bolster product development.】

item.title: 贸易协议有望达成，资金流入，卢比升至今年最高点
item.description: 印度卢比飙升至今年以来的最高水平，原因是资金再次流入股市，以及人们对早日与美国达成贸易协议的预期。【原文：The Indian rupee surged to its highest level this year amid renewed inflows into stocks and expectations of an early trade deal with the United States.】

item.title: 特朗普在访问海湾地区前几周推出迪拜豪华大厦
item.description: 就在美国总统访问这个石油资源丰富的海湾地区前几周，特朗普组织开始销售迪拜的一座大厦和酒店，其中将包括豪华住宅。【原文：The Trump Organization is starting sales on a Dubai tower and hotel that’s set to include luxury homes, just weeks ahead of the US president’s visit to the oil-rich Gulf.】

item.title: 中国股票销售摆脱关税影响，超越美国和欧洲
item.description: 尽管贸易战的担忧减缓了美国和欧洲市场的销售，但中国企业仍摆脱了美国关税的影响，继续推进股票销售。【原文：Chinese companies have shrugged off US tariffs and powered on with share sales, even as trade-war concerns slowed offerings in the US and Europe.】

item.title: 台湾经济凭借前装和人工智能实现一年来最大增长
item.description: 台湾经济以一年来最快的速度增长，这主要得益于企业为规避美国关税而匆忙出货导致的出口激增，以及对人工智能相关硬件的需求。【原文：Taiwan’s economy grew at the fastest pace in a year, fueled by a surge in exports as companies rushed shipments to avoid US tariffs and demand for AI-related hardware.】

item.title: 人工智能先行 "热潮席卷全球，Duolingo 课程增加一倍多
item.description: 即使以硅谷的标准来衡量，Duolingo 公司也是与众不同的，它积极推动将人工智能渗透到业务的各个角落，同时也公开承认某些岗位可能不再需要人工。【原文：Even by Silicon Valley standards, Duolingo Inc. has set itself apart with its aggressive push to infuse artificial intelligence into all corners of its business while also openly acknowledging humans may no longer be needed for certain roles.】

item.title: 美国一些最重要的经济数据正在衰退
item.description:
美国统计局前局长谈为何收集官方统计数据越来越难

。【原文：

A former head of the BLS on why gathering official statistics is getting harder.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：重要的美国经济数据正在衰退 (播客)
item.description: 在最好的情况下，收集官方经济数据也是一项艰巨的工作。但现在，一系列不同的因素结合在一起，使这一过程变得更加困难。人们不再像以前那样对调查做出回应。对调查的回应也变得更加政治化。与此同时，特朗普政府希望削减政府开支，人们担心，官方资源的减少将使统计部门追踪美国经济变得更加困难。【原文：Gathering official economic data is a huge process in the best of times. But a bunch of different things have now combined to make that process even harder. People aren’t responding to surveys like they used to. Survey responses have also become a lot more divided along political lines. And at the same time, the Trump administration wants to cut back on government spending, and the worry is that fewer official resources will make tracking the US economy even harder for statistical departments th】

item.title: 高盛认为央行将购买更多人民币和新加坡元
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：South Korea, Singapore and China’s currencies are likely to be the biggest Asian beneficiaries as central banks look to diversify their reserves away from the dollar, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: DN Solutions 因市场不确定性搁置 11 亿美元的首次公开募股计划
item.description: 由于市场的不确定性，韩国机械工具制造商 DN Solutions Co.【原文：South Korean machine-tools maker DN Solutions Co. shelved what could have been the largest initial public offering in Seoul this year due to market uncertainty, in a setback to the nation’s share-sale recovery.】

item.title: 据说上海基金正在考虑收购大冢制药在 MicroPort 的股份
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，上海实业投资控股有限公司（Shanghai Industrial Investment Holdings Co.【原文：A fund backed by Shanghai Industrial Investment Holdings Co. is in talks to buy Otsuka Holdings Co.’s stake in Chinese medical device maker MicroPort Scientific Corp., according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税导致欧洲汽车制造商取消指导计划
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策促使欧洲几家最大的汽车制造商取消了财务指导，这凸显了特朗普瞬息万变的贸易策略所引发的混乱程度。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariffs prompted several of Europe’s largest automakers to scrap financial guidance, underlining the extent of the chaos unleashed by his fast-changing trade tactics.】

item.title: 毛里求斯发出暴雨警告后关闭银行
item.description: 毛里求斯气象部门发出暴雨警告后，毛里求斯中央银行宣布周三为银行假日。【原文：Mauritius’s central bank declared Wednesday a bank holiday after the country’s meteorological services warned of torrential rainfall.】

item.title: 泰国因贸易战和地震影响经济增长而下调关键利率
item.description: 泰国央行连续第二次下调关键利率，这是自 10 月份以来的第三次下调，此举旨在支撑因贸易战和 3 月 28 日地震而受到打击的企业和消费者情绪。【原文：The Bank of Thailand cut its key interest rate for the second straight meeting and the third time since October, moving to shore up business and consumer sentiment that’s been battered by the trade war and the March 28 earthquake.】

item.title: 钻石业不景气打击经济，博茨瓦纳希望削减开支
item.description: 博茨瓦纳财政部长表示，钻石市场的长期低迷已导致博茨瓦纳将预算赤字预期提高到科维德事件后的峰值，博茨瓦纳有意削减开支以抵消这一影响。【原文：Botswana is intent on cutting spending to offset the effects of a prolonged downturn in the diamond market that’s led it to raise its budget deficit forecast to post-Covid peaks, its finance minister said.】

item.title: 泰国称穆迪作出 "负面 "展望是 "急于求成
item.description: 泰国说，穆迪评级公司在没有等待东南亚国家与美国延迟的贸易谈判结果的情况下，就将泰国的评级展望改为负面，这是在 "偷梁换柱"，因为美国威胁要对泰国征收 36% 的关税。【原文：Thailand said Moody’s Ratings “jumped the gun” when it changed its outlook for the country to negative without awaiting the outcome of the Southeast Asian nation’s delayed trade talks with the US, which is threatening to impose an 36% tariff.】

item.title: OpenAI 修正了使 ChatGPT 变得媚俗、虚伪的更新内容
item.description: OpenAI撤回了对 ChatGPT 的软件更新，因为该软件对一些用户产生了过度媚俗的回应，这是这家卷入激烈的人工智能竞争的初创公司最近出现的一个小插曲。【原文：OpenAI rolled back a software update to ChatGPT that produced excessively fawning responses for some users, the latest hiccup for a startup embroiled in a heated AI contest.】

item.title: 匈牙利经济因工业产值下滑而意外萎缩
item.description: 由于工业不景气，匈牙利第一季度经济意外萎缩，这凸显了该国的贸易风险，甚至在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）开始全球关税战之前就已经存在。【原文：Hungary’s economy unexpectedly contracted in the first quarter due to an industry slump, highlighting the country’s trade exposure even before US President Donald Trump embarked on a global tariff war.】

item.title: 安本资产因客户外流和市场波动再次下降
item.description: 安本集团第一季度资产缩水 113 亿英镑（150 亿美元），原因是市场波动和资金外流共同影响了业绩。【原文：Aberdeen Group Plc’s assets shrunk by £11.3 billion ($15 billion) in the first quarter as a volatile market and outflows combined to dent performance.】

item.title: 肯尼亚食品价格上涨，通胀率升至八个月高点
item.description: 由于玉米、土豆和绿色蔬菜等食品供应紧张，肯尼亚 4 月份的年通货膨胀率攀升至 8 个月来的最高点。【原文：Kenya’s annual inflation rate climbed to an eight-month high in April on tight supply of food items including corn, potatoes and green vegetables.】

item.title: 葛兰素史克第一季度利润超出预期，得益于哮喘和艾滋病药物
item.description: 葛兰素史克公司（GSK Plc）公布的第一季度利润好于预期，其哮喘和艾滋病药物的销售抵消了疫苗业绩的低迷。【原文：GSK Plc reported better-than-expected profit in the first quarter, with sales from its asthma and HIV drugs offsetting a lackluster vaccine performance.】

item.title: 波动性减弱，格伦科尔预计贸易利润下降
item.description: Glencore Plc 预计今年商品营销利润将再次下降，因为其交易商赖以生存的波动性将继续减弱。【原文：Glencore Plc expects commodity marketing profits to fall again this year, as the volatility that its traders thrive on continues to fade.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司在利润不佳的情况下仍坚持向投资者派发红利
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）表示，该公司将保持对投资者的回报，因为其强劲的资产负债表有助于其抵御因炼油业务疲软和油价下跌而导致的利润降幅超过预期的情况。【原文：TotalEnergies SE said it would maintain returns to investors as its strong balance sheet helps it withstand a bigger-than-expected drop in profit due to weak refining and lower oil prices.】

item.title: 英国国家统计局称英国房价跌幅为 2023 年以来最大
item.description: 据英国最大的抵押贷款机构之一称，在针对购房者的减税政策到期以及消费者信心因美国关税而下滑之后，英国 4 月份的房价创下了近两年来的最大跌幅。【原文：UK house prices registered the biggest decline in almost two years in April after a tax break for buyers expired and consumer confidence tumbled in response to US tariffs, according to one of Britain’s biggest mortgage lenders.】

item.title: 法航-荷航亏损因高端旅行和更便宜的燃料而收窄
item.description: 法航-荷航（Air France-KLM）第一季度亏损收窄，原因是该公司受益于燃油费下降、成本削减以及高端旅行需求持续强劲。【原文：Air France-KLM reported a narrower first-quarter loss as the airline benefited from a lower fuel bill, cost cuts and consistently strong demand for premium travel.】

item.title: 受贸易战担忧影响，黄金支持ETF在2025年卷土重来
item.description: 据世界黄金协会（World Gold Council）称，受全球贸易战日益加剧的影响，投资者在第一季度纷纷涌向黄金支持的交易所交易基金，资金流入推动金银在三个月内上涨了19%。【原文：Investors rattled by the growing global trade war flocked to gold-backed exchange-traded funds in the first quarter, with inflows propelling bullion’s 19% rally in the three-month period, according to the World Gold Council.】

item.title: 阿迪恩收入增长22%，公司警告宏观不确定性
item.description: Adyen NV 公布第一季度净收入增长 22%，但警告称，与经济不确定性上升有关的风险可能会减缓这家荷兰支付处理商的增长速度。【原文：Adyen NV reported 22% net revenue growth in the first quarter, warning that risks related to rising economic uncertainty could slow growth at the Dutch payment processor.】
